long_description: With a large and stable platform, the 437g Time ATAC MX 4 clipless bike pedals deliver mud-shedding performance for trail, all-mountain and enduro riding. Rugged, large-platform composite pedal bodies offer plenty of surface contact area for sure footing; dual-sided entry makes it easy to get in and out of the pedals quickly. Self-cleaning design sheds mud and dirt to ensure you can clip in and out with minimal hassle. Stout steel axles ensure strong, lasting performance. Reversible cleats offer either 13deg or 17deg release angles, letting you adjust how much you have to twist your feet to exit the pedals. When clipped in, you'll have 10deg of rotational float and 6mm of lateral float, striking a good balance between comfort and performance. Time ATAC MX 4 clipless bike pedals include pedals, cleats and cleat mounting hardware; cleats fit most shoes with SPD-style, 2-hole mounts.
short_description: With a large and stable platform, the 437g Time ATAC MX 4 clipless bike pedals deliver mud-shedding performance for trail, all-mountain and enduro riding.
